test_sum01.generated_summary: Customer’s orders are confirmed by the Seller in writing. The delivery schedule shall become effective upon receipt by the Customer of the Confirmation.

test_sum010.generated_summary: Copying and/or reproducing, transmission to a third party of the Products or Services or technical information or Technical Data or training manuals without the Seller’s written express approval is strictly forbidden.

test_sum011.generated_summary: In no event shall the Parties be liable for any indirect, consequential, incidental, special or punitive damages.

test_sum012.generated_summary: A Party may terminate all or part of the contract for default of the other Party in the event that the other Parties persistently fails to perform its obligations.

test_sum013.generated_summary: AH owns all the intellectual property and know-how generated by the analysis of the Data, Processed data and/or Anonymous data.

test_sum014.generated_summary: The content and the time schedule of the training courses shall be confirmed at the time of signature of the contract, at the Customer’s request and depending on the instructor, helicopter and/or simulator availability.

test_sum015.generated_summary: Training Means mean the Helicopter, the tools, the simulator, the infrastructure and the equipment used by the Seller to perform the Training Service(s).

test_sum016.generated_summary: The Seller may cancel any training course that does not meet the minimum enrollment quota. The Customer will be notified of the cancellation at least 30 days before the scheduled dates of the training session.

test_sum017.generated_summary: The Customer is responsible for loss of and damage to the Seller’s property and to the Training Means and personnel at all times while at the facilities, except in cases of gross negligence or wilful misconduct.

test_sum018.generated_summary: The Customer will be asked to fill, sign and return a site survey report for the Seller to assess if the training can be performed at the site selected by the Customer, depending on the type of training, the Seller may carry out a survey at the Customer’s premises or other location.

test_sum019.generated_summary: The Seller may perform the Training Services at its convenience, notably regarding the use of the Training Means for as long as the training objective and/or regulation requirements are reached and price, duration, delivery date not affected.

test_sum02.generated_summary: If the Quotation is required by the Customer, the contract shall become binding when the Seller receives the Customer’s written approval of such Quotation.

test_sum020.generated_summary: The Customer agrees not to install or use the software on any computer or other hardware other than those in which it was originally installed.

test_sum021.generated_summary: At the time of the signature of the contract or at the latest 10 days before flight training start, the Customer shall provide the Seller with a certificate of insurance containing this provision.

test_sum022.generated_summary: All Seller’s Wet Training sessions are provided in English, unless otherwise agreed in the Contract.

test_sum023.generated_summary: Each Party remains solely and exclusively responsible for the information exchanged and shall take any appropriate action to comply with the applicable laws and regulations.

test_sum024.generated_summary: The Customer holds harmless any third party claim arising from a breach of these warranties.

test_sum025.generated_summary: The SaaS and/or DaaS is designed to perform the described service or product specifications. In case of error or defect, the Customer must provide relevant information to enable the Seller to investigate the defect. The Seller will remedy such errors/defects by providing a correction release or by finding a reasonable workaround solution.

test_sum026.generated_summary: If the Technical Data information is not provided by the Customer, the Seller may perform the R&O Service according to Technical Data in force.

test_sum027.generated_summary: It is understood between the Parties that the Seller shall carry out the R&O Service in its own workshops or have such reconditioning carried out by a Seller selected workshop.

test_sum028.generated_summary: The exchange Part and the removed Part are the Customer’s property. The Customer cannot request return of the Part (Core Unit).

test_sum029.generated_summary: The Seller is prepared to carry out an investigation on the Part sent to the Seller, even if the Customer opts not to have the work performed.

test_sum03.generated_summary: Any configuration changes requested by the Customer require prior mutual written agreement and may lead to an adjustment in price and/or delivery time.

test_sum030.generated_summary: Unless otherwise specified, to be eligible under warranty, the failure must have occurred within defined time-limits for any pre-owned helicopter not sold in an “as-is” condition: Within 500 flying hours or 12 months after acceptance at the delivery location, whichever event occurs first.

test_sum031.generated_summary: This training is granted to the Customer personally and may not be transferred or assigned.

test_sum032.generated_summary: The following expenses shall be borne by the Customer: Coverage of ground and in-flight risks incurred by its personnel and risks arising from the civil liability.

test_sum033.generated_summary: Reasonable insurance coverage of risks arising from the Training flights and technical training are included in the Seller’s insurance policy.

test_sum034.generated_summary: If a flight simulator is not available or simulator training not compliant with regulations, simulator flight hours will be replaced by Helicopter flight hours for a specific duration.

test_sum035.generated_summary: The Seller’s technical representatives fluent in English or in French will remain subject to their national labour regulations. They will be available for 5 days per week and without exceeding a certain amount of hours per day.

test_sum036.generated_summary: This on-site support is provided at the Customer’s choice either at the time of the first basic inspection or At any given time chosen by the Customer, but no later than fifteen months after acceptance of the last Helicopter delivered to the Customer.

test_sum037.generated_summary: The Customer agrees that the SaaS users must abide by the GCU.

test_sum038.generated_summary: Unless otherwise specified, the Customer’s authorization is assumed for necessary maintenance / ground runs without additional agreement.

test_sum039.generated_summary: If the Seller needs to send the BFE/CFEFEFE parts to the original equipment manufacturer for any reason, the Seller will be charged to the Customer for the service.

test_sum04.generated_summary: The Customer is liable to the Seller for a fixed amount of forty Euros for cost recovery fees.

test_sum040.generated_summary: The Helicopter shall be handed over by the Customer in airworthiness condition with its complete and updated documentation and flight manual in English and all of its equipment in serviceable condition.

test_sum041.generated_summary: In the event of any conflict between these documents, the following order of precedence shall apply.

test_sum042.generated_summary: Supplier shall have the responsibility for verifying, guaranteeing and certify compliance of its Products and Services with all applicable industry standards and regulations.

test_sum043.generated_summary: The Parties shall comply without diversion with the United States of America, the European Union and any applicable national export control, sanctions and embargoes laws and regulations.

test_sum044.generated_summary: Prior to the purchase order signature date, the Supplier shall identify the Export Regulations applicable to the Products and/ or Services (the Export Control Classification) and subsequently notify.

test_sum045.generated_summary: The Supplier represents that, at the date of signature of the purchase order, the Supplier is not subject to any sanctions lists or located in a comprehensive embargoed country.

test_sum046.generated_summary: The obligations relating to confidentiality shall remain in full force and effect for the duration of any purchase order and continue for a period of 20 years or as long as 1 helicopter remains in service.

test_sum047.generated_summary: The Parties agree that any Personal Data exchanged is collected and will be exchanged in compliance with the applicable Personal Data protection laws and regulations.

test_sum048.generated_summary: Supplier shall give notice immediately to the Purchaser of any investigation or legal proceeding initiated against the Supplier by any public authority relating to an alleged violation of applicable laws and regulations relating to the execution and/or performance of the purchase order.

test_sum049.generated_summary: Any Dispute that the Parties fail to resolve amicably within 3 months shall be brought exclusively before the courts of Paris.

test_sum050.generated_summary: This Loan Agreement shall not be amended except by a specific agreement in writing.

test_sum06.generated_summary: Transfer of ownership of the Product is subject to the prior fulfilment by the Customer of its obligations.

test_sum07.generated_summary: The Customer shall effect and maintain an appropriate insurance coverage, including but not limited to a hull all risk and hull war risk insurance coverage.

test_sum08.generated_summary: The Customer shall bear all risks related to the Helicopter and waive the right of any recourse against the Seller, its assignees and its directors, officers, agents and employees to this respect.
